For Appointments, Call 248-217-1454

I'm John Niebauer, an independent stylist currently working out of Fern and Dale's Hair Salon in Ferndale, MI.

I strive to create an exceptional experience for my wonderful and loyal clients. I provide the highest level of service to meet your needs and desires through communication and ongoing education.

I look forward to meeting you!
